org.paukov.combinatorics
Class Factory

java.lang.Object
  org.paukov.combinatorics.Factory

public class Factory
extends java.lang.Object

This is the factory class to create combinatorics vectors and generators. It is recommended to use this class to create vectors and concrete generators

Version:
2.0
Author:
Dmytro Paukov
See Also:
ICombinatoricsVector, IGenerator
